# Jimmytube

> VIDZ VIDZ VIDZ

![chix](http://i.imgur.com/H3xxlSr.gif)

### Install and Develop

Requires node, bower, and gulp.

```shell
npm install -g gulp bower gulp # if you don't already have gulp & bower
git clone git@github.com:maxrelax/jimmytube.git
cd jimmytube
npm install
bower install
gulp serve
```
